original: intros CF1 CF2. apply: comp_cont. - apply: dapp_cont. - apply: dapp_cont. ++ move => x. apply: dapp_mono. ++ move => x. apply: app_mono. ++ move => x. apply: cont_mono. ++ apply: contE. * move=> x. have M1: monotone f1 by apply: cont_mono. have M2: monotone f2 by apply: cont_mono. have: monotone (f1 \o f2) by apply: comp_mono M1 M2. move=> M3. rewrite -(Kleene.reindex (T2 := T1)). erewrite (comp_chainE _ M2). apply: fun_leq. * move=> s. move: (@contE _ _ (f1 \o f2) _ _). rewrite comp_chainE. move=> H; apply: H.
